channel.title: Vote Command + Points or give currency 718 loading 742
channel.description: Hi, i am using the rune-evo source and i am trying to implement a ::vote command that takes you to a votepage and lets you vote then for voting you get votepoints or if thats not possible it gives you some currency that can be used in a vote reward stroe, any help is appreciated thanks.

item.title: Vote Command + Points or give currency 718 loading 742
item.dc:creator: @ildarkelly ildarkelly
item.description:
@ildarkelly wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals(“vote”)) {
player.getPackets().sendOpenURL(“http://exorcism.createaforum.com/”);
return true;

im the owner of the server btw - and ive added this command in and it works and takes you to a website.

anyone got any idea on how to make it give rewards if you voted?

Read full topic
item.source: Vote Command + Points or give currency 718 loading 742

item.title: Vote Command + Points or give currency 718 loading 742
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

just make a simple vote command that opens up the link of your vote page. Example:

		case "vote":
			player.getPackets().sendOpenURL(url here);
			return true;

never seen how runeevo looks :L if u need help with error’s post it here

Read full topic
